fulltext:
…Continued… 
Thang Giang Nguyen 
Senior C/C++ Software Developer 
Full stack IT professional with extensive knowledge of C/C++ Software development 
Senior C/C++ Software Developer, with a proven ability to plan, administer, coordinate and execute full 
lifecycle Windows-based/ Embedded application design and development projects. Broad experience in 
C/C++ software programming and development, management, installation, maintenance, administration, 
security, troubleshooting and technical support. Knowledge of diverse programming languages, 
architectures, and platforms, with the ability to apply expertise in the successful completion of IT projects. 
Outstanding ability to gather and translate complex client requirements into practical, reliable, cost-
effective software and system solutions. Proactive problem solver, developing software solutions with 
careful consideration to bottom-line, long-range goals, quality, feasibility and ease of use. 
Full Lifecycle C/C++Development • Programming • Troubleshooting & Issue Resolution 
 Application Development • Automotive Development • Global Team Player 
PROFESSIONAL EXPERIENCE 
Led full lifecycle development of automotive applications/ services at Vehicle Microcontroller (VuC) and 
System On Chip (SOC) for Continental Automotive Singapore, spreading on various modules: Audio, 
Communication Box, Record of Behavior, Vehicle Probe, IPC, Diagnostic, CAN… Analyzed requirements, 
designed at black-box/ white-box level, coded in C language and conducted testing for all working 
modules. 
Key Achievements: 
• 
Served as part of 30-members team located across Germany, India, Singapore, Malaysia and 
Vietnam in VuC/ SOC development for diverse automotive applications/ services development 
projects. 
• 
Successfully delivered development product with high commitment and quality, got high credit 
from customer, expanded Vietnam team from 3 developers to 10 developers. 
• 
Achieved exemplary customer satisfaction survey scores of up to 92/ 100. 
Played key role in 20-members global team tasked with development and testing of Connectivity/ Audio/ 
Media modules for Continental Automotive Singapore. Participated in development of automotive 
applications at System On Chip (SOC). Served as Software Integrator/ Test Lead, responsible for full 
lifecycle of software delivery, testing and integration. Reported to senior management and project 
stakeholders. Led five-members team in Vietnam in Audio manual and automation testing. 
Key Achievements: 
• 
Successfully deployed the Software Integration process from Singapore to Vietnam which no one 
believed it could, thus reduced the cost for project. 
• 
Opened a new team at Vietnam with 6 members to handle the entire integration and automation 
testing of Audio domain. 
• 
Received top 100 superior performance award (over 10,000 employees) for FPT-Software in 
2016. 
Senior C  Developer (August 2016 – Present) 
FPT Software HCM, Vietnam 
Software Pre-Integrator/ Test Lead (August 2015 – August 2016) 
Continental Automotive, Singapore 
Senior C++ Developer (May 2014 – August 2015) 
LUXOFT, Vietnam 
Thang Giang Nguyen 
Page Two 
Coordinated with 30-members global team in development of Human Machine Interface (HMI) for the 
Automotive industry. Developed HMI components based on HMCDIS2 Core with production quality 
according to automotive industry standard, while adding new features required by customer. Optimized, 
troubleshot and resolved issues with existing modules. 
Key Achievements: 
• 
Quickly learning and exploring project technical, one of the most helpful person in team. 
• 
Successfully developed HMI Module Tuner (Weather/ Traffic/ Sport/ Safe View) in C++. 
Assisted in development of medical information system in C#/ C++ (front-end and back-end applications 
for MRI machine). Created new and additional functionality of existing source code in accordance with 
customer requirements, in addition to improving performance by refactoring source code. Led project 
teams and supported team members to ensure successful completions. Played key role in coding, unit 
testing and integration testing. 
Key Achievements: 
• 
Got very high credit from customer for pilot period, thus got the contract to expand team from 2 
members to 7 members. 
• 
Increased the performance up to 23%, help to reduce the time of body scanning and hospital 
could serve more patients. 
• 
Consistently achieved exemplary customer satisfaction survey scores of up to 99/ 100. 
C#/ C++ Developer (August 2011 – May2014) 
FPT Software HCM, Vietnam 
EDUCATION & CREDENTIALS 
HUFLIT (HO CHI MINH CITY UNIVERSITY OF FOREIGN LANGUAGES – INFORMATION TECHNOLOGY) 
Bachelor of Information Technology, 2011 
FPT APTECH 
Diploma in Information System Management, Higher Diploma in Software Engineering, 2010 
TECHNICAL PROFICIENCIES 
Languages/ Programming: C, C++, C#, python, .net, Java 
IDE: Microsoft Visual Studio 2003/ 2005/ 2008, Intel Parallel Composer 2011/ 2013, QT Creator, 
Eclipse, E2 Studio 
Design: IBM Rhapsody, Visual Paradigm, Astah Community 
Testing: Vector Cast, NUnit, CPPUnit, Test Complete, Automation Test Platform, IBM Rational Change, 
Jenkins, TEMPPO, DOOR 
Database Management System: Microsoft SQL Server 2005/ 2008, SQLite 
Subversion: IBM Rational Synergy, GIT, TortoiseSVN, Perforce, Visual SourceSafe

educations.school: HUFLIT (HO CHI MINH CITY UNIVERSITY OF FOREIGN LANGUAGES - INFORMATION TECHNOLOGY)
educations.major_categories: Máy tính và công nghệ thông tin
